user_data.concept: Lucha por la libertad y autodescubrimiento

narrative.title: Esclavitud
narrative.entity: El peso de la tecnología y las expectativas
narrative.lyrics: I'm searching for a way to express, The way I feel, it's like a mess

narrative.title: Espíritu
narrative.entity: La chispa de la creatividad y la esencia propia
narrative.musical_representation: Solos de guitarra, cambio a tonalidades mayores
narrative.lyrics: But I won't give up, I'll keep on trying, To find my voice, and stop denying

melody_data.technical_details: Uso de palm muting en riffs, slides en solos

lyrics: I'm searching for a way to express
The way I feel, it's like a mess
But I won't give up, I'll keep on trying
To find my voice, and stop denying
